name: The Butcher
description: One of the cultists in the %LOCATION_NAME is drawing too much attention to themselves. They continue their former life as a butcher, but their warped soul and broken mind has driven them to begin to feed various unfortunate citizens to his customers. While profitable, and by all accounts delicious, this has a good chance of attracting the attention of the city guard, who will take a dim view on his supply chain, and might compromise the entire cultist group.

choices.name: Perhaps they will not notice?
choices.description:
Ignore the problem, and hope the city guard to not notice. If they do, your infiltration will be heavily impacted. 

-50% Chance for no effect 

50%Chance to lose 30 infiltration

outcomes.description: The butcher is apprehended as he exited the city morgue. His associates, your valuable worshippers, were imprisoned, questioned and never seen again. Lose 30% infiltration in %LOCATION_NAME

The only witness was quickly disposed of by the butcher, and no further incidents occurred. He continues to ply his profitable, if unconventional, trade, and the cult in %LOCATION_NAME continues to thrive.

choices.name: The cult must deal with this inconvenience in this midst
choices.description:
Occasionally a useful instrument must be cast adrift, to avoid the whole ship sinking. The butcher, and his profitable income stream, is lost to the cult, but the rest are safe. 

-Lose 10% infiltration in %LOCATION_NAME

outcomes.description: The other cultists dispose of the butcher, dumping his unfortunate body in the wilderness. The cult's congregation is reduced, but the majority remain safe.
